metadata.synopsis: PAD for characters reacting to finding Isobels plaque in the Ketheric Mausoleum. Has 3 reaction states:- Already know Ketheric is Isobel's Father- Don't know aboutfamily relationship but have met Isobel- Don't know about family relationship and haven't met Isobel
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on Isobels PLaque in the Ketheric mausoleum

0.speaker: Player
0.text: So Ketheric had a daughter. Wonder what became of her?

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Isobel. That's the name of the cleric at Last Light Inn, right?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Can she possibly be Ketheric's daughter?

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Isobel's sarcophagus. Before Ketheric brought her back.
